net.sf.jclal.activelearning.stopcriteria

Class MaxIteration

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.stopcriteria.MaxIteration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IConfigure, IStopCriterion, JCLAL

    public class MaxIteration
extends Object
implements IStopCriterion, IConfigure
    Class that represents a stop criterion related with the maximum of iterations.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
